com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb

Class PPLB_SetUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLB_SetUtil

  • public class PPLB_SetUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for setting programs related to the printer parameters of the PPLB emulator. This class is used in PPLB class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPLB_SetUtil(PPLB emulation)
      This is the constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setBackfeed(boolean isEnable, int offset)
      This function is used to set whether the label is backfeed and the backfeed distance before printing.
      void setClearImageBuffer()
      This function is used to clear the image temporary area. If you do not want to leave the print content of the previous label, please use this function.
      void setDarkness(int darkness)
      This function is used to set the printing temperature of the printer head.
      void setHardwareOption(PPLBMediaType mediaType, PPLBPrintMode printMode, int cutValue)
      This function is used to set the printer's hardware settings, including: the media type, the action mode of the label after printing.
      void setHomePosition(int x, int y)
      This function is used to set up the label's origin.
      void setLabelLength(PPLBMediaTrack type, int length, int gap)
      This function is used to set the detection mode of the label and the label length. This parameter is required for continuous label.
      void setMediaCalibration()
      This function is used to allow the printer to do the label length detection and calibration.
      void setOrientation(boolean isInvert)
      This function is used to set the printing direction.
      void setPrintOut(int numberOfLabelSet, int numberOfCopyOfEachLabel)
      This function is used to output the print command and the number of prints to a temporary area. This is equivalent to the end of a label format content.
      void setPrintRate(int printSpeed)
      This function is used to set the printing speed.
      void setPrintWidth(int width)
      This function is used to set the printing range, equivalent to the media width.
      void setReset()
      This function is to reboot the system and clear all data stored in the buffer and memory.
      void setSerial(int baudRate, SerialParity parity, int dataBits, SerialStopBits stopBits)
      This function is used to set parameters of the printer's serial port (RS-232).
      void setStorage(PPLBStorage storageType)
      This function is used to set the location of the object's storage device, including form, garphic, font.

      • setClearImageBuffer

        public final void setClearImageBuffer()
                               throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException

        Throws:

      • setStorage

        public void setStorage(PPLBStorage storageType)
                throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the location of the object's storage device, including form, garphic, font. And this setting will be invalid after shutdown.
        Parameters:
        storageType - [in] Location of storage device. Use PPLBStorage enum to set up.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBStorage

      • setLabelLength

        public final void setLabelLength(PPLBMediaTrack type,
                                 int length,
                                 int gap)
                          throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                 BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the detection mode of the label and the label length. This parameter is required for continuous label.
        Parameters:
        type - [in] Media detection mode. Use PPLBMediaTrack enum to set up.
        length - [in] To set the media length. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        gap - [in] To set the gap length. Range: 16~600; unit: pixel.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBMediaTrack

      • setPrintWidth

        public final void setPrintWidth(int width)
                         throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the printing range, equivalent to the media width.
        Parameters:
        width - [in] To set the mdeia width. Range: 2~width of printer; unit: pixels.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setHomePosition

        public final void setHomePosition(int x,
                                  int y)
                           throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                  BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set up the label's origin. Default coordinate is at the lower right corner (0,0).
        Parameters:
        x - [in] X-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        y - [in] Y-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setOrientation

        public void setOrientation(boolean isInvert)
                    throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the printing direction.

        If the function has been called multiple times, the printing will be effected according to the last setting.

        Parameters:
        isInvert - [in] Whether to print in the inverted mode.'true' is the inverted mode;'false' is the normal mode; the default value is'false'.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setHardwareOption

        public final void setHardwareOption(PPLBMediaType mediaType,
                                    PPLBPrintMode printMode,
                                    int cutValue)
                             throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                    BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the printer's hardware settings, including: the media type, the action mode of the label after printing.
        Parameters:
        mediaType - [in] Media type. Use PPLBMediaType enum to set up.
        printMode - [in] The mode of action taken toward the label after printing. Use PPLBPrintMode enum to set up.
        cutValue - [in] The number of cuts. Range: 1~255.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBMediaType, PPLBPrintMode

      • setBackfeed

        public final void setBackfeed(boolean isEnable,
                              int offset)
                       throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                              BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set whether the label is backfeed and the backfeed distance before printing. This function will feed the label. After printing, the label will be fed forward to the specified length, and the specified length is the set value.
        Parameters:
        isEnable - [in] Whether the label is backfeed.'true' means to backfeed; 'false' means not to backfeed; the default value is 'false'.
        offset - [in] The offset value of the feed. Range: -30~30; unit: pixel. Normally, when isEnable is 'true', the offset is set to 0 to be the correct tearing position. When a offset occurs, this value is used to make fine adjustments.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setDarkness

        public final void setDarkness(int darkness)
                       throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                              BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the printing temperature of the printer head.
        Parameters:
        darkness - [in] Set the temperature of printer head. Range: 0~15. Printing quality can never be determined by any single factor. To get better printing quality, various factors have to be considered, for example: printing speed, media types, ribbon types (wax, semi-resin and resin), image pattern, ... etc.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setPrintRate

        public final void setPrintRate(int printSpeed)
                        throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                               BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the printing speed.
        Parameters:
        printSpeed - [in] Print speed. Range: 1~8; unit: IPS.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setSerial

        public void setSerial(int baudRate,
                      SerialParity parity,
                      int dataBits,
                      SerialStopBits stopBits)
               throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                      BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set parameters of the printer's serial port (RS-232).
        Parameters:
        baudRate - [in] Baud rate. Supports: 2400, 4800, 9600, 19200, 38400, 57600, 115200.
        parity - [in] Parity-checking bits. Use SerialParity enum to set up; supports: SerialParity.None, SerialParity.Odd, SerialParity.Even.
        dataBits - [in] Data bits value. Supports: 7, 8.
        stopBits - [in] The stop bits value. Use SerialStopBits enum to set up; supports: SerialStopBits.None, SerialStopBits.One.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        SerialParity, SerialStopBits

      • setMediaCalibration

        public final void setMediaCalibration()
                               throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to allow the printer to do the label length detection and calibration.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • setPrintOut

        public final void setPrintOut(int numberOfLabelSet,
                              int numberOfCopyOfEachLabel)
                       throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                              BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to output the print command and the number of prints to a temporary area. This is equivalent to the end of a label format content. So, after the function call been completed, there will be the beginning of a new label format content. When you need to output multiple label formats content, you can use combined mode as: PPLB_SetUtil.setPrintOut + ... + PPLB_SetUtil.setPrintOut + PPLB_IOUtil.printOut.
        Parameters:
        numberOfLabelSet - [in] The number of label (number of serial label). Range: 1~65535.
        numberOfCopyOfEachLabel - [in] The number of copies of each label (the number of printed copies of the same label). Range: 1~65535.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLB_IOUtil.printOut()
